thread.title: Delta Air Lines declares quarterly dividend
thread.title_full: Delta Air Lines declares quarterly dividend

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Delta Air Lines declares quarterly dividend
text:
Delta Air Lines declares quarterly dividend 
ATLANTA, GA - Delta Air Lines' Board of Directors today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.135 per share. 
The dividend is payable to shareholders of record as of the close of business on November 6, 2015 and will be paid on November 30, 2015. Oct 23, 2015
